reviews.review_text: I came to this Home Depot to get parts to fix a gutter. I didnt know much, so I approached the team member in the aisle. He was very helpful and gave me some good tips. I managed to get the job done. Home Depot always has better prices than other hardware stores, so I tend to go to Home Depot before anywhere else.

Bought Artika light bars online from home Depot - loved it so much I got 2! Perfect lighting for make up - even works on a dimmer. Pictures dont do it justice, its hard to decipher the glam level unless viewed in person. Liberace would be proud!

Staffs are really helpful and friendly and more surprisingly have enough patience. I was there looking for hinges or something which could hold mirror on wall. As I was trying to look for it but could not find then approached one of employee who was busy doing her part. She tried to help me all way.well I don t remember her name but she had courtesy to help customer patiently. I would like to visit this place again.
Wonderful experience, thanks to Mr VIRAL for his kind and outstanding customer service. I fond a lot of options with various prices   :)

One individual stood out among the rest - Scott, whose exceptional customer service skills shone through at Home Depots Henning location. When I couldnt find the desired 24 x 48 corrugated plastic sheets due to their unavailability, Scott came to my rescue. Despite only having larger 48 x 96 sheets in stock, he willingly offered to cut one in half for me, even though I didnt have any tools with me. Scotts helpfulness was refreshing, especially after encountering three other unhelpful employees. As my young daughter astutely pointed out, Scott was the only staff member who made us feel truly welcome. The management team at Home Depot should acknowledge and appreciate employees like Scott, as his outstanding customer service sets an example for his peers to follow.

i have been here sooo many times to just buy screws, nuts, bolts, shovels, bulbs, paint, batteries, drills, tapes, paint cloths, paint sprays, cleaning sprays, mop, orchid soil, etc...and everytime i ask someone they always have something to teach me BUT not everyone is good at explaining even if they are somewhat knowledgeable. and granted that I always do my extensive research to the point that I already know what i need, im glad i can cross check their facts as well...and so far i trust them. return policy is also awesome! i can try items out without worrying if i will keep it if i dont like it. they even have a washroom, self checkout, email receipts, and such. probably the only negative part is that its a bit cold here because its more like a warehouse because ALL of the items are stocked on the shelves. will always come back here. its a very convenient place. always call ahead if you are thinking of final purchase what you saw online. most of the time online item count is correct BUT there is always customers picking items off the shelves and roaming around with it.
Excellent customer service! There is a wonderful lady (Alison I think?) that works the self checkouts and she is the best!

I absolutely love the events HomeDepot organizes for kids. After attending, my daughter is always in a fantastic mood, which lets me shop in peace. The store layout is intuitive, and Ive never had issues finding what I needed. I also want to give a shoutout to the staff at tool rentals theyve been super helpful and truly deserve recognition!

We recently did a small project in our home. We were helped by Kelly Zhao from the kitchen department. She was outstanding. Very patient and professional. Took her time to explain everything to us. We very much appreciate her help. Its very rare in this day and age to find such exceptional customer service.
Everything about tools you can find in this area
First time in a home Depot. Found exactly what I needed. Staff was helpful. They even had sections to use their own tools to cut items as per needed

My safe space where I go to escape the horrors of everyday reality. I wish I could live in the store. Build a home from all the materials in the corner. Live off the plants. Nothing makes me happier than filling a bag with slightly differently sized nails.

I had an order pick up.Mohamad Latif brought it. He was very nice, helpful. My order didnt fit in my car. He took it back in and gave me helpful suggestiob of how to pick up later. At the end with his great patience and help I could take my order home. He went above and beyond to do his job well. I would always shop at home depot when there are people like Mohamad Latif working there.

This specific Home Depot is one of my favourites in the area. You wont need to go elsewhere since everything you need is right here. This facility provides dependable rental alternatives for a wide range of machinery and equipment. All of the equipment required to repair on my friends rental apartment was located in one place, making life easier!

I recently visited Home Depot Burnaby and was pleasantly surprised by the helpful and knowledgeable staff, many of whom were Persian. They went out of their way to assist me with my home improvement needs and made the shopping experience a breeze. While the store itself was typical of any Home Depot, the staffs friendly and attentive service made all the difference. I would highly recommend Home Depot Burnaby to anyone in the area looking for great service and quality products.
Friendly staff specially one cashier on autopay she is the best. Hope his job recognize her effort and give some incentives or best salary.
Big and spacious and had the 6 vinyl air conditioner ducting that I went to 2 other locations for.   5 stars on that alone!
Wonderful shopping experience. Lots of knowledgeable staff. Got all my stuff and out in under 20 minutes! Awesome!
Souleyman is a champ! He helped me with all my door and indoor panel selections. He s got extensive knowledge

Today I had the best experience ever! A lot of associates helped me out today, but the ones that stand out for me today were Alison and Harry! They are amazing! Alison was super sweet and helped me getting someone (Harry) to carry something to my uber! Harry was super helpful and very patient! Amazing customer service! Ill be definitely coming back!

The nice thing about Home Depot is that they have just about everything you need to get the job done. With many locations around there is usually one or two nearby. They also store the majority of their wood indoors making it so much easier to work with. Home Depot also delivers making it super convenient for those who dont have a vehicle to haul heavy loads!
Great service, polite and professional staff, rented a van- decent pricing. Loved my experience with them.
My go-to HD in 2023. Good customer service and hassle-free experience. Clean and tidy store.
Suler busy today but they were managing th crowds great. Employees were happy to help us with our questions. Halloween section and selection is amazing this year suler wanted thr huuuuge skeleton

Great place frequented by the trades and DIY There is lots of selection and great deals on sale items. This is definitely a good alternative to Canadian Tire. Free on site parking. Close to Bus, Subway station .
What can I say... its a home depot. Standard pricing, great selection and amazing service.
Typical Home Depot with friendly staff. Great lighting selection. Come here lots and never have bad service.
The staff here were very helpful. I was walked through everything I needed and taken aisle to aisle to pick and choose all the required items.

The kids workshops are free on the second Saturday of the month at various locations.  You have to book quick through their online registration page.  The kid gets to build the craft of the month.   Kids gets pin, apron and certificate when they complete the craft. Fun times had by all.
Love this store. Lots of parking.  Knowledgeable and friendly staff. Spacious layout.

I went into this Home Depot to pick up a Charlie Brown Christmas tree and some Christmas decor. The staff (Alex Hernandez) was extremely helpful. He went out of his way to help me find my product and give recommendations on the latest deals. I was shocked at how friendly and helpful the staffs were at this location. Great customer service and I will come back!
Last month, we were provided with excellent service at your store. Dhruv was very patient and enthusiastic to help us choose our required goods, and we truly appreciate it.

We just wanted to comment on the painters we were given from your referrals.  We live in Burnaby and recently had our condo painted by Endorme Restorations.  Anselmo was very professional as were his crew.  He was very polite and helpful with the choosing of wall color.  They worked quickly and efficiently finishing in a very timely manner as well as giving us a fair and honest price. We would highly recommend them for your all your paint jobs and will also  be recommending them to all our friends. Thank you Liz
Easy access, friendly staffs, good shopping experience. Good quality.

I went to Burnaby Home Depot to buy florescent light. Two staff members in this centre were so helpful. First, I asked Yaneth about the florescent colours. Although she was for the gardening section, she helped me a lot, and then she stayed with me until Meena came, who worked in the electrical section, and she exactly helped me with the questions I had. They were absolutely kind and helpful.

Great service. I bought a patio heater here and had some problems with it. Alex and Jessa from outdoor sections really helped me a lot. They helped me check the products and got me a new one since is factory defect. They are extremely patient and professional and very friendly as well. Very satisfied with my experience at homedepot.
Great store, really helpfull
Great service and nice staffs. Huge selection of everything you need the most for home repair, materials, and so on. Lots of free parking available on site.

Great place to get anything you need for renvation and any do it yourself projects. Good place to rent big tools you can use for 24 hours, tools that could help finish your project quicker. Every time I rented, the project went really fast and was easier to finish.

Absolutely amazing experience at Home Depot in Burnaby! My husband and I ordered flooring from this store for our new place for an amazing price - it turned out there was an issue with the shipment, but the staff handled it with so much care and understanding. We were in touch with the manager Trinh, and Desmond, from the flooring department. They not only offered us new flooring at a better quality, but also offered it to us for the same price. We got lucky this issue was handled by such caring staff members. Thank you Burnaby Home Depot.
We ordered all our major appliances in this store. No doubt all the sales and the delivery men are very professional and nice. Thanks Aman, everything was put in order.

It was like walking into a magical wonderland with fairies, rainbows and cherubs all around you. So fine was my journey through the mystical aisles of merriment that I felt a wave of joy overcome the deepest reaches of my immortal soul and my heart began to flutter as if I had been kissed by God herself. Then, I found a 2x4 that fit my needs perfectly. 12 out of 10 experience
The best thing about the store is the touch less clean washrooms. Even paper towel dispenser is touch less.

I went to home Depot today and had the most amazing customer service experience I have ever had!!! Akmal was eager to help me after he finished with another customer and he made sure I found what I was looking for. He didnt just direct me to the area he walked me to the area and told me to come back if I had any other questions. He didnt make me feel like I bothered him he seemed like he just wanted to make sure I was happy when I left. And happy I was!! Akmal needs to train everyone!!
Veru good and nice people... dey greet u well
Home Depot has to be one of the best places to find supplies for home and building needs whether its repairing Plumbing electrical you name it nice guys have what you need

I come here very frequently and have had many great interactions with employees in all departments. It seams like the work culture is good from the outside in. I just wanted to shout out Alec in appliances, super friendly and helpful. It was a very enjoyable experience. I tried finding a manager/supervisor to let them know that I had a good experience, but was unable to find one.

I Love walking up and down the aisles of this Home Depot. It mostly has stock of popular items while other Home Depots are out of stock. All the departments have pretty much everything you need and more for any type of thing around the house. The staff are knowledgeable, friendly, helpful and professional. Parking lot is always tidy and a lot of parking stalls, never had to take anytime to search for one. Great prices as well, and they will price match if a different store has the same product but cheaper.

Great location. On my trip here I found the floor reps were so helpful and they went out of their way to ensure I had everything I needed today! Thank you to the fabulous workers today! Cya next visit!

Thank you Home Depot for your excellent staff. Appreciated the helpful and knowledgeable customer service from Amir in lighting .... And as well want to send a kudo to Dennis who helped me locate eco presto logs for the fireplace...also very knowledgeable about the store.  You make it easy to shop here when you have people such as Amir and Dennis.

There was a good selection of products with friendly and helpful staff. It is in a very transit-accesible location. During spring, there are lots of flowers, trees, bushes, and other plants for sale. It is very average for a home improvement store though, with some products hard to locate. I found what I was looking for (with some help from the staff).
Helpful staff. Always find what I need unless it doesnt exist.
Picked up a silent auction item today that I won and Home Depot donated.
Very knowledgeable and helpful staff

Always interesting to visit Home Depot even if I just need a small item to repair or put up a piece of home furnishings I am in awe of the beautiful renovation display for your kitchens and bathrooms and love to see it e go everytime I go also plenty of ideas in store to update my home with the finest materials home Depot has to offer ..

The self checkout is now assisted checkout and the service is incredible. Lots of staff around to ask questions. They go above and beyond here. Allison said its her excuse to be nice all day and by golly she was the shining light to my day. Would go out of my way to return to this store. Thanks!

Friendly service from a manager today in the faucet area. I didnt catch his name but he helped us to pick out kitchen sink faucets. He knew we were new to this and was probably wondering why it took me and my partner a long time to pick a faucet! He came back to check up on us and graciously gave us a deal without even being asked! He brought to the till and took care of us! Very friendly and wished I asked for his name and thank him again.

Had a great experience while shopping at Home Depot, Arath helped me find the tools I needed with his knowledge of product placement and then Aiyana who was working the checkout was very kind and professional! Awesome staff
Super nice staff always helpful.

I was there yesterday and I met Andre who is one of the best staff that I met in any store.  My wife and I were amazed at how brilliant he is and couldn t help but leave a review today.  We were quite clueless and he was a tremendous help. We were able to get everything that we were looking for...he even helped us to find an item that were not available at the store when we did computer search with another staff. We will definitely be returning to Home Depot @ Burnaby location!!!
Free masks & Gloves.  Prettiest parking lot of any Home Depot Ive been to

This store is one of the best Home Depot s I have been to. The staff are friendly and they always seem to have what I need. The store is well kept and made inviting instead of intimidating with so many items on display. Keep up the great work.

I was here to get several large black & yellow totes, some zip ties, and Ant traps. Found exactly what I was looking for, with the help of many staff readily available. At cash out, I had great reception, and cashier was very friendly. Im satisfied that I chose this location.

Friendliest cashier ever! Not sure how we got into the importance of loving kindness within the timespan of one transaction (at the self checkout no less) but her positivity was infectious and welcome on a rainy day.

Yeah I love home Depot! Its like a Toys are us for grown ups. Today I got to deal with a Gentleman named Andre, Andre proved he knew his power tools, he took the time to show me all my options and in the end it was about getting the best value for my money. Thank you Andre! Im very happy with my purchase.

The staffing level here is amazing, maybe the best among the homedepot I have been to in lower mainland. It was easy for me to find staff to direct me to the right sections of the store. Staff were polite and their directions were spot on.

I go to multiple home Depot locations and I give them all five stars for being an amazing Corporation and understanding peoples lives and freedoms. I can walk through the entire store and purchase what I want without anybody pestering me about wearing a mask. Thank you home Depot, your humanity shall prevail in sales.
Great customer service. Found what I needed which was kool and they always have kool tools here

I m here a lot because of work and I ve always had good experiences with the store and employees. But my favourite thing about Home Depot is the plant selection, every plant I ve purchased from here has done well and I get loads of compliments on them. The plants are very well priced as well. Definitely recommend buying plants from here.

Awesome customer service, of the chain home improvement stores, home depot has the best customer service from floor staff. There are many retired trades people who work here and they are so knowledgeable. If they dont know the answer they will try to find someone else. I was looking to buy laminate flooring and they literally walked me through the entire process. Yes, I know its simple, but its still awesome!

Great place to shop with lots of nice people to help you find things. I went there for 2inch bolts and 1/4th nuts and wing nuts. They sell them in bulk buy as many you need or in packages in ten or more with the screws and nuts. I like shopping here and even though its Thanksgiving its busy. I cant wait to go back there to shop and very good prices.
This Home depot store is one sample of being success in customer service. Thanks all.
Big and quite location. Very good customer service , I bought a light bulb and the crew help me to get the right bulb. So impressive. Self serve cashier was so good as someone would assist you.

I ve always has such a good experience shopping at this location. The staff has always been very helpful. Needed some tiles samples and one of the gentleman was more than happy to show me everything I was looking for.

I needed a dehumidifier but didn t want to spend too much money. Home Depot online had a great selection at various price points. An online only special with great reviews as my top pick and I had it shipped to this Home Depot location in case of porch pirates. The dehumidifier was damaged when I went to pick it up. They were great about the refund, no hassle. I was disappointed and so they offered to price match a similar model that they had in-stock. The ones they had in-stock were not what I wanted so I declined the offer. Alexander was awesome at really empathizing with my situation and I honestly felt he did everything he could to resolve the issue so I could leave as a satisfied customer. I ended up reordering the same unit and picked it up this weekend. It works great and I felt that Alexander went over and above for my repeat business.

I have been buying from here for many years. I always have a great experience. Both the manager and all the employees do their job well. But  in my opinion , Mr. SAEED , shines like a shining star and a diamond. This man really helps customers much more than he can handle. He is unique. Home Depot should encourage such a person to be both encouraged and enthusiastic and for other employees to know that the Home Depot management system; Pays special attention to employees who work wholeheartedly. And  respects and values them highly
Thanks Louis and Hari at the wood cutting station for the great service!
Good place to buy hardware for house hold needs.

I just wanted to write about  how stellar the customer service was at this location. I used to occasionally buy paint from  this store years ago  but was never thrilled about it. The last time I was in, I was so impressed by the assistance from the group of gentleman that were working. Fred, Taylor and the Behr paints gentleman (I m sorry I can t remember his name) were so warm and funny. It was a truly special experience and one I sadly don t usually receive from customer service stores anymore but wow, they really went above and beyond with helping me choose the right products and offered unbiased opinions. other stores should take a lesson from what excellent service looks like as I will certainly be coming back regularly. Thank you Burnaby Home Depot Paint!

I love shopping at the Home Depot. They have everything you need when it comes to fixing up your home and more. Prices are always fair if not better than most retailers and almost match most online sites for price. Love the convenience of them being so close to home. Their staff are very informative and know their products.
Found quality wood and store cut it down to size for us too

I am almost every day at the Home Depot due to my reno project. Adel, a gentleman who works at the garden department is one the best guys in that branch. I found him very knowledgeable, professional and helpful expert to consult and advise about my gardening needs and issues. He very simply explain the cause of the problem and shows the best way or best product to solve the problem. Jashwa is also a talnted young guy who can help you as well in your gardening activities. Thank you both!
Huge selection and best prices around. Great place to come for pretty much anything home improvement related
I visited that store today and it was my best Home Depot experience because of Alma. She helped us a lot and provided us best customer experience! Thank you so much Alma!

Ok when  I go to HD I don t really expect any sort of customer service.  Actually  reps are usually hard to find and I feel are not educated . Today I visited this location and the service and attention exceeded my expectations.. especially on a Saturday afternoon. I was greeted and asked if I needed any help by 3 reps.  Amazing Anyways , I was looking to purchase a sale item which was sold out.  A rep name Kyle (fawcett dept) checked to see if there was anymore in the store and other stores and then offered to price match another similar item.  I was really surprised as I didn t know it can be done so I got what I needed at the same price . Thx to this fine young man.

Every staff members are different. We got Shawn from Electrical to help us today, and he was extremely helpful and listen to what we had to say instead of trying to get rid of us and just give what we wanted as quickly as possible. All stores, not just Home Depot, should have employees like him!

I want to point out super service I received from 2 female staff members in the Burnaby store.  I was wandering the main aisle looking for a sign that said  Vacuums , when a lady asked me if I needed assistance.  I told her that I was looking for hand-held vacuums - specifically corded.  I had already visited 2 competitor stores, and they seemed to carry cordless only.  Since I already owned 2 cordless, including one of the coveted and expensive Dysons, which lasts 10 minutes from fully charged to a sudden zero; then a subsequent 2 hours to charge and then another 10 minutes of working.  Jay  checked the department and found only cordless, but concluded that some corded machines were available online.  To confirm this, she checked with  Sarah  from that department. I was already happy to return home to order. Jay then said that she would check online to ensure that it was in stock. It was indeed, and since she had the product on the screen, informed me that I could order it then and there,  if I wanted to, and have it delivered free of charge to my home.  Jay started the order, and Sarah completed it.  I was impressed with 2 staff members going out of their way to make sure that I had what I wanted.  Thank you, Jay and Sarah!

Today, I want t highlight the professional, caring and knowledgeable work of Yanet Gaviria. She works for the seasonal department. Her performance should be recognized. Didnt she only help me during my time at the store searching for organic seeds, she was also multitasking without making me feel I was left alone in my search. She was answering questions with such confidence that clients took the time to say thank you, I like the product you recommended. I thought she was the supervisor or manager because of her attitude towards clients and the store. Thank you Yanet! Please Social media at Home Depot, pass our regards to this ambassador of your store. Thanks.

The staff here are wonderfully knowledgeable and can help with even the weirdest requests. I know this because, while building a 250 gallon salt water fish tank, not only did they help me find adaptors, couplings and other assorted bits, they directed me to other stores where I could find what I needed. #respect. You might have to wait a bit while they are helping other customers because their experts are in high demand, but they will be worth the wait.

MR ANDRE FROM HARDWARE wow! I had to rave about the service provided by the hardware manager Andre. I just moved into North Burnaby and have decided to get into diy renovations. as i m new here and inexperienced,   I don t know my way around certain tool bits which can make looking for help a little awkward. This man Andre was instantly friendly, knowledgeable and patiently demonstrated what to look for and even set up the battery for the tool set I was going to purchase.  He did all this while also helping out a group of probably five other customers waiting and was calm and professional throughout. As we get more automated, the art of customer service seems lost on the younger generation but it s service like the one Andre provides that keeps many of us coming back to these stores and someone I can reliably come to in the future.

Great shopping experience .Thank you for the wonderful and helpful service you provided for my first hardware, wood-furniture project. The service that was above and beyond my expectations. I will definitely return to this location!

The staff is friendly and helpful to help me track the fireplace and move it for me. They also honour the price tag that on the display not on the computer, he walk with me to the cashier make sure I have the right price. And they do have many good deals time to time. So I always come here to check it out and grab the good deal.

Desmond in the flooring department is knowledgeable, professional and friendly too.  He helped me cut my zebra blinds to custom lengths.  I am thrilled.  Most Home Depot locations close to me do not have someone who knows how to custom cut zebra blinds.  Thank you Desmond! You re the BEST!

By far our favourite place to go to get home supplies. We visited around 6 stores for flooring before getting the help from Jimmy and he answered all of our questions. We had several restrictions from our Strata, so it was complicated to get the flooring we needed. We ended up buying all of our flooring here and were super happy. Were definitely going back here whenever we need more tools or supplies. Thanks Jimmy!

Ive been to this home depot five times in the last five days getting supplies for some renovations to my new apartment. When it comes to customer service, this place is consistent! I didnt just have one good experience in this store, I had five GREAT experiences back to back. The employees here are amazing, so helpful and so friendly. They definitely made a very stressful project significantly less stressful.

We the pleasure of meeting a member of the Home Depot team, at the checkout counter, by the name of Allison today. An absolute pleasure of a customer service experience. Thank You Allison for your fine assistance, the the entertainment factor (ie: your background singing was very lovely, lol). Stay Blessed Overall, the knowledge that each staff member has specific to their department is priceless. Makes for a great and efficient shopping experience. Thank you Team Home Depot

I needed some plumbing staff to install my new laundry machine and i didnt know what do I need and how can I connect them to gather They helped me find my stuff and they had enough knowledge about it I got what I needed without wasting time Also costumer services is  awesome. That was a good shopping day for me. And i enjoyed it.
Nash was very kind and extremely helpful. He helped us retrieve a planter from the garden centre =)
We were able to find everything we needed

This store is always neat and most of the time has everything you need for your home or garden project. The service is good, perhaps thats why is most of the time crowdy.  They have plenty of parking space. Its also convenient for contractors, as they have special costumer service and cashiers for contractors only. Best place for renting heavy tools.
